otherNames: Million Times Attack Speed, 1 Million Times the Attack Speed, 我有百万倍攻速,I have a million times attack speed
synopsis: After Ye Yun was reborn in the Tianwu Continent, he activated the Myriad Realms Devouring System, and received a reward of a million times the attack speed in the novice gift package. Since then, he has become an invincible powerhouse! As the saying goes, the world’s martial arts can only be fast, you think I’m just picking my nose and ears? In fact, just now I have swung the sword 35,000 times, swung the sword 87,000 times, and also performed various boxing and secret techniques.
